name: Reinha - LoL Champ Demo
description:
Spec demo for League of Legends. Champion name: Reinha. Her skillset's inspired by Unreal Tournament. To quickly sum her up: she's an enabler. The good kind. Her cc enables her teammates to do tons of damage, more than they ever could before.

Controls:

  • Right-click mouse to move around
  • Q, W, E, R, F for abilities (smart-cast only)
  • Esc for additional info
